title: By the King, a proclamation for suppression of popery
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the twentieth day of November, 1673. In the twenty fifth year of our reign."
Ordering enforcement of the Penal laws against recusants.
